polygon.style: border-block-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); border-inline-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); column-rule-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill: rgb(255, 217, 102); font-family: 'trebuchet ms', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 25.6px; outline-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding-block: 5px; padding: 5px; padding-inline: 5px; stroke: rgb(193, 98, 0); stroke-width: 5px; text-decoration: none solid rgb(0, 0, 0); text-emphasis-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); -webkit-text-fill-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); -webkit-text-stroke-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

g.style: border-block-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); border-inline-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); column-rule-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill: rgb(255, 217, 102); font-family: 'trebuchet ms', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 25.6px; outline-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding-block: 5px; padding: 5px; padding-inline: 5px; stroke: rgb(193, 98, 0); stroke-width: 5px; text-align: center; text-decoration: none solid rgb(0, 0, 0); text-emphasis-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); -webkit-text-fill-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); -webkit-text-stroke-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

div.span: Player enters the corridor leading to the power plug

rect.style: fill: rgb(13, 0, 50); font-family: 'trebuchet ms', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 25.6px; padding-block: 5px; padding: 5px; padding-inline: 5px; stroke: rgb(42, 0, 168); stroke-width: 5px;

g.style: border-block-color: rgb(204, 204, 204); border-color: rgb(204, 204, 204); border-inline-color: rgb(204, 204, 204); caret-color: rgb(204, 204, 204); color: rgb(204, 204, 204); column-rule-color: rgb(204, 204, 204); fill: rgb(13, 0, 50); font-family: 'trebuchet ms', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 25.6px; outline-color: rgb(204, 204, 204); padding-block: 5px; padding: 5px; padding-inline: 5px; stroke: rgb(42, 0, 168); stroke-width: 5px; text-align: center; text-decoration: none solid rgb(204, 204, 204); text-emphasis-color: rgb(204, 204, 204); -webkit-text-fill-color: rgb(204, 204, 204); -webkit-text-stroke-color: rgb(204, 204, 204);

div.span: This is a test of survival. Last 100 seconds, and the exit will open.

path.style: font-family: 'trebuchet ms', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; stroke: rgb(211, 211, 211); stroke-width: 2px;

g.style: background-color: rgb(88, 88, 88); fill: rgb(204, 204, 204); font-family: 'trebuchet ms', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-align: center;

span.style: background-color: rgb(88, 88, 88); border-block-color: rgb(204, 204, 204); border-color: rgb(204, 204, 204); border-inline-color: rgb(204, 204, 204); caret-color: rgb(204, 204, 204); color: rgb(204, 204, 204); column-rule-color: rgb(204, 204, 204); fill: rgb(204, 204, 204); font-family: 'trebuchet ms', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; outline-color: rgb(204, 204, 204); text-align: center; text-decoration: none solid rgb(204, 204, 204); text-emphasis-color: rgb(204, 204, 204); -webkit-text-fill-color: rgb(204, 204, 204); -webkit-text-stroke-color: rgb(204, 204, 204);
